code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[num1,setNum1]=useState('');const[num2,setNum2]=useState('');const callAPI=(num1,num2)=>{var myheaders=new Headers();myheaders.append("Content-Type","application/json");var raw=JSON.stringify({"num1":num1,"num2":num2});var requestOptions={method:"POST",headers:myheaders,body:raw,redirect:"follow"};fetch("https://1nxs3vcjg3.execute-api.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/testadd",requestOptions).then(response=>response.text()).then(result=>alert(JSON.parse(result).body)).catch(error=>console.log('Error:',error));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();callAPI(num1,num2);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Submit Numbers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Number 1:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:num1,onChange:e=>setNum1(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Number 2:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:num2,onChange:e=>setNum2(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})]});}export default App;
